trans-unit.source: Provides data for the paint events of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce dati per gli eventi di disegno del <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"> </xref> controllo.

trans-unit.source: A ChartPaintEventArgs object is used to set chart properties during the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.PostPaint> and <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.PrePaint> events of the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> control.
trans-unit.target: Un oggetto ChartPaintEventArgs viene utilizzato per impostare le proprietà del grafico durante il <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.PostPaint>e <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.PrePaint>gli eventi del <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>controllo.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.PrePaint> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.PostPaint>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartPaintEventArgs.Position%2A> property allows you to position chart elements, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartPaintEventArgs.ChartGraphics%2A> property facilitates GDI+ drawing operations.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartPaintEventArgs.Position%2A>proprietà consente di posizionare gli elementi del grafico e <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartPaintEventArgs.ChartGraphics%2A>proprietà semplifica le operazioni di disegno GDI+.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartPaintEventArgs.ChartGraphics%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartPaintEventArgs.Position%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartPaintEventArgs.Chart%2A> property gives the developer access to the root <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> object, which can be used to set various properties of the chart.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartPaintEventArgs.Chart%2A>proprietà offre allo sviluppatore di accedere alla radice <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>oggetto, che può essere utilizzato per impostare diverse proprietà del grafico.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartPaintEventArgs.Chart%2A>

trans-unit.source: The Chart property allows the developer to set chart properties during the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.PostPaint> and <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.PrePaint> events of the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> control.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà del grafico consente allo sviluppatore di impostare le proprietà del grafico durante il <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.PostPaint>e <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.PrePaint>gli eventi del <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>controllo.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.PrePaint> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.PostPaint>

trans-unit.source: Gets an object for the event.
An <xref:System.Object> that represents the chart element.
Use this object property during a painting event to: - Help with the conversion to and from relative and/or absolute chart coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare questa proprietà oggetto durante un evento di disegno per:-supporto per la conversione da e verso le coordinate del grafico relativo e/o assoluto.

trans-unit.source: - Perform custom drawing using a GDI+ <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object.
trans-unit.target: -Eseguire il disegno personalizzato utilizzando un GDI+ <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>oggetto.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: Use this object property during a painting event to position a chart element.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare questa proprietà dell'oggetto durante un evento di disegno per posizionare un elemento del grafico.
